page.title: 13Steeple Claydon-Recreation
page.content: Recreational activities are very varied.Only a small proportion of the population do not participate in some form of{pastime}be it sport-orientated or a less active hobby such as model making,pottery,bee keeping or attending groups such as{Young Wives who meet to fulfil a social need for friendship or moral support in times of stress. Most houses have gardens and as a result more than 25% of the population have{gardening}as a serious hobby. Children are able to{play}out of doors around the village,on the Recreation Ground or by the small river.They ride bikes and play games that imitate life as they see it.Watching{television}is very popular.There is a great demand for{Adult Education}which may be met when the new school Hall is opened later this year.
